commands.name: init
commands.summary: initializes a new dapple project in the current folder

options.name: [-r <filter>]
options.summary: filter classes with a regular expression

options.name: [--dump-file=<DumpFile>]
options.summary: Dump all solidity files to a chosen json file for inspection and verification

options.name: [--dump-dir=<DumpDir>]
options.summary: Dump all solidity files to a chosen directory for inspection and verification

options.name: [--no-optimize]
options.summary: turn off the optimization step during compilation

options.name: --no-migration
options.summary: turn of local and global migration
